description:
The Shimazu clan of Satsuma managed to expand from their province to take over the entire island of Kyushu. And in time even the man who had unified Japan, Tokugawa Ieyasu, would come to fear how tough they could be!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s Enjoy Kyuushuu Heitei, Shimazu Yoshihiro!
Let`s Enjoy Unifying Kyushu! Shimazu Yoshiiro
レッツエンジョイ九州統一, 島津義弘!
